content:
Can you create a safety jingle in the format of a catchy HTML page? The jingle should include the following elements:
- A title with the words "Safety First"
- An image of a person wearing protective gear
- A list of safety tips in bullet point format
- A chorus that emphasizes the importance of safety in a fun and memorable way
Once you have created the HTML page, can you also provide the corresponding CSS code to make the page visually appealing?
